languages.text: {n}Кожа немолодого варвара во многих местах покрыта татуировками, изображающими механизмы — словно кто-то задумал выдать нарисованные на теле шестерни за настоящие аугменты. В волосы вплетены провода и обрывки шлангов, а также осколки экрана разбитой инфопластины. С большого бубна на нитях свисают платы когитатора.{/n}

{n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кожа немолодого варвара во многих местах покрыта татуировками, изображающими механизмы — словно кто-то задумал выдать нарисованные на теле шестерни за настоящие аугменты. В волосы вплетены провода и обрывки шлангов, а также осколки экрана разбитой инфопластины. С большого бубна на нитях свисают платы когитатора.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is tattooed in many places with images of mechanisms — as if someone thought that ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flexible tubes are tied in his hair, which is also adorned with shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads off of his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

{n}The ageing barbarian's skin is tattooed in many places with images of mechanisms — as if someone thought that ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flexible tubes are tied in his hair, which is also adorned with shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads off of his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang from threads off of his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

{n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老いた未開人の肌は機械の入れ墨でいっぱいだ。ペン画で描かれた歯車の歯は、本物のオーグメティックのようでもある。電線と金属片で作られた柔軟な管の数々が、壊れたデータスレート・スクリーンの破片とともに髪の毛に編み込まれている。考算機の回路基盤は彼の式典用ドラムに糸で吊されている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}老いた未開人の肌は機械の入れ墨でいっぱいだ。ペン画で描かれた歯車の歯は、本物のオーグメティックのようでもある。電線と金属片で作られた柔軟な管の数々が、壊れたデータスレート・スクリーンの破片とともに髪の毛に編み込まれている。考算機の回路基盤は彼の式典用ドラムに糸で吊されている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这位年迈的野蛮人皮肤上遍布着机械装置图案纹身，就好像墨水画出的齿轮真的能当做植入物一样。他将电线和软管碎片编进发辫中，其中还混了一块数据板屏幕的碎片。他的大型仪式鼓上连着一根线，连接着沉思者的电路板。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这位年迈的野蛮人皮肤上遍布着机械装置图案纹身，就好像墨水画出的齿轮真的能当做植入物一样。他将电线和软管碎片编进发辫中，其中还混了一块数据板屏幕的碎片。他的大型仪式鼓上连着一根线，连接着思考器的电路板。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La peau ridée du barbare est recouverte de tatouages de mécanismes, comme si les rouages dessinés à l'encre pouvaient passer pour de véritables augmétiques. Ses cheveux sont entremêlés de bouts de câbles électriques et de fragments d'un écran de plaque de données, et son tambour de cérémonie est orné de circuits imprimés de cogitateurs suspendus par des fils.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La peau ridée du barbare est recouverte de tatouages de mécanismes, comme si les rouages dessinés à l'encre pouvaient passer pour de véritables augmétiques. Ses cheveux sont entremêlés de bouts de câbles électriques et de fragments d'un écran de plaque de données, et son tambour de cérémonie est orné de circuits imprimés de cogitateurs suspendus par des fils.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La avejentada piel del bárbaro está cubierta de tatuajes de mecanismos, como si los dibujos hechos con tinta pudieran pasar por auméticos de verdad. Ha trenzado su pelo con cables y tubos flexibles, además de fragmentos de una pantalla de una tablilla de datos rota. De su gran tambor ceremonial cuelgan placas de circuitos de cogitadores atados a hilos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La avejentada piel del bárbaro está cubierta de tatuajes de mecanismos, como si los dibujos hechos con tinta pudieran pasar por auméticos de verdad. Ha trenzado su pelo con cables y tubos flexibles, además de fragmentos de una pantalla de una tablilla de datos rota. De su gran tambor ceremonial cuelgan placas de circuitos de cogitadores atados a hilos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Haut des alten Barbaren ist bedeckt mit Tätowierungen von Mechanismen — als könnten die Tintenzeichnungen von Zahnrädern als tatsächliche Augmentationen durchgehen. Drähte, Kabel und Reste von Flexröhren sind in seine Haare eingeflochten, ebenso wie die Splitter eines kaputten Datablock-Bildschirms. Cogitator-Platinen wurden mit Schnüren an seiner großen zeremoniellen Trommel festgebunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Haut des alten Barbaren ist bedeckt mit Tätowierungen von Mechanismen — als könnten die Tintenzeichnungen von Zahnrädern als tatsächliche Augmentationen durchgehen. Drähte, Kabel und Reste von Flexröhren sind in seine Haare eingeflochten, ebenso wie die Splitter eines kaputten Datablock-Bildschirms. Cogitator-Platinen wurden mit Schnüren an seiner großen zeremoniellen Trommel festgebunden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yaşlanmış barbarın teni, mekanizma dövmeleriyle kaplı. Dişlilerin mürekkep çizimleri, gerçek ogmetik zannedilebilecek kadar sahici. Kablolar ve kablo borusu parçalarının yanı sıra kırık bir databela ekranının kalıntıları da saçına iliştirilmiş. Büyük tören davuluna kavramsayar devre kartları asılmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The ageing barbarian's skin is covered in tattoos of mechanisms — as if the ink drawings of cogs could pass for actual augmetics. Wires and scraps of flex tubing are braided into his hair, as well as shards from a broken data-slate screen. Cogitator circuit boards hang on threads from his large ceremonial drum.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaşlanmış barbarın teni, mekanizma dövmeleriyle kaplı. Dişlilerin mürekkep çizimleri gerçek ogmetik zannedilebilecek seviyede gerçekçi. Saçına kablolar ve kablo borusu parçalarının yanı sıra kırık bir databela ekranının kalıntıları iliştirilmiş. Büyük tören davuluna kavramsayar devre kartları asılmış.{/n}
